name: Russian roulette (itch) (IlyasDev)
description:
Basically russian roulette you click you either survive or die. You can play it with your friends or famiy and have the same fun but of course no one will die.

We are working on an update that will give the game a more realistic touch with some amazing mechanics and animations so stay tuned,

Consider donating to help us make our games better and make better games and bigger projects.
